Rainy_Day_0: The rain sure is coming down, isn't it?$6
Rainy_Day_1: Don't forget to wear a coat. I don't want you getting sick, okay?$2
Rainy_Day_2: Make sure you wear a coat, you don't want to catch a cold out there.
Rainy_Day_3: I wonder if Boxy is okay.$2#$e#I worry about him a lot, but he just won't let me catch him.$6
Rainy_Day_4: I gotta check on my bees. I'm sure the rain is causing some problems.$2
patio_Nikolai: The farm's looking great, you've been working so hard.#$e#I'm really happy to be here.
spouseRoom_Nikolai: I have no idea what to do today.#$e#Maybe I can entertain myself with video games or something.$3
Rainy_Night_0: Let's cuddle, I love holding you.$4
Rainy_Night_1: I gotta take my medicine soon, feeling sort of weird.$6
Rainy_Night_2: You're soaked to the bone! Go put some dry clothes on.$2#$e#Maybe get a blanket too, you look cold...$6
Rainy_Night_3: I missed the sun today. Maybe I should get a sunlamp for days like this.$2#$e#It could be worse though - the farm could flood.$6
Rainy_Night_4: Maybe stay inside?#$b#I heard some pretty scary thundering outside.$6#$e#We could drink something hot together, it'll be nice.$4
Rainy_Night_5: My mom used to say that rain is Yoba taking a leak on the world.#$b#She sure was silly.$3#$e#I'd love to take you to the islands one day. I need to visit her grave soon.$6
Indoor_Day_0: Do you think we could get some goats?#$e#I love goats.#$b# I love animals, honestly. They're all so cute!$1
Indoor_Day_1: I love you, @.$4#$e#We should go do something romantic today.#$b#Maybe a picnic.$4
Indoor_Day_2: I'd love to go into Zuzu with you.#$e#We could go out to eat and look at the sights.$1#$e#I go to Zuzu for the mental health clinic but I've never really looked around.$6
Indoor_Day_3: I've been trying to figure out how to move my bees over here, but I can't seem to think of a way that won't stress them out.$2#$e#I really don't want to hurt them. Maybe I'll just leave them there on my old property.$6
Indoor_Day_4: Do you think maybe we could go out sometime? I'm getting pretty restless.$1#$e#Oh, maybe we can go to Zuzu and see a movie.
Indoor_Night_0: I hate the dark.$2#$e#I know nothing will happen, but I get really nervous when the sun goes down.$6
Indoor_Night_1: Hey baby, you look tired.$2#$e#...and sweaty. Do you want to wash up before bed?$1
Indoor_Night_2: I tried reading today and I actually got pretty far in my book before I started getting distracted.$1#$e#Oh no, I don't remember a bit of the book, though.$3#$e#It's pretty funny if you think about it. I forget things pretty quickly.
Indoor_Night_3: I'm glad you're finally home.#$e#I always get worried when you're outside at night.$6#$e#There could be something dangerous lurking around, you know?$2
Indoor_Night_4: Do you think Willy would let us use his boat?$6#$b#I've been wanting to go boating again and he let me use it last time.$1#$e#Remember the boat ride we had on the lake?#$b#I really enjoyed that. You looked so nice that night.$4
Outdoor_0: The farm is much bigger compared to my little piece of property.#$e#I love it here though, the wide open space makes me feel free.
Outdoor_1: Feel that breeze?#$e#It's really nice! The islands were always breezy because of the ocean.$1#$e#It's really nice during the summer there.
Outdoor_2: This farm is so big that we could probably throw a pretty decent party here.$1#$e#Wouldn't that be fun? We could invite some friends!
Outdoor_3: I tried picking up around the farm a bit this morning. There's so much land I don't know how you take care of it all.$6
Outdoor_4: I really think my bees would love it here.#$e#If I could figure out how to move them...$6
funLeave_Nikolai: I'm going to go check on my bees and then after I think I'll hang around town a bit, okay?$1#$e#Maybe I'll go to the saloon later this evening too.
funReturn_Nikolai: I know it's not as busy as your day, but I've sure done a lot today.#$e#I wish I could be busy every day but I think I'd get overwhelmed if I was.$6
OneKid_3: We have kids!#$b#Isn't that crazy? I never thought I would.$1
OneKid_2: We need to buy more toys for %kid1...$6#$e#They seem so bored all the time.
OneKid_0: %kid1 threw a fit this morning, I had no idea what to do.$2#$e#Luckily they calmed down after a while but it was really stressful.$7
TwoKids_0: %kid1 and %kid2 seem to get along really well.#$e#I like seeing them play together, it's very cute.$1
TwoKids_2: %kid2 seems to be a lot like me. It makes me worry.$2#$e#I just hope they're not too much like me.$6
TwoKids_3: The kids have been fed. You just worry about the farm, okay baby?$1
Good_1: Hey, cutie.$4#$b#You look really nice today.$4#$e#You remind me to look my best by being so attractive all the time.$3
Good_2: ...$1#$b#Last night was so romantic.$4#$e#I love you so much, @.
Good_3: I never thought I'd find love.#$b#But then you came along. Thank you for noticing me.#$e#I was used to being invisible, so it was really nice when you started talking to me like you did.
Good_4: I played some of my game today! It was really fun until I got mad at it.$7#$e#Those levels just keep getting harder.$6
Good_5: I was thinking about it and I've been pretty happy lately.$1#$e#Everything's improved so much since I met you.#$b#Maybe you're good luck.$3
Good_6: My mom wasn't very spiritual. I guess I took after her in that regard.#$e#I guess it's, like, easier for me to think it's all fake - that way I don't start freaking out about the supernatural, you know?$6
Good_7: If you smell smoke, that's my bad. I tried cooking and it sort of went badly.$6#$e#But good news is I bought something from Gus![206 241 231]
Neutral_0: Are you hungry?[224]#$e#I made that myself this time!$3
Neutral_1: I've been watching Peertube lately. I like the gameplays - they're fun to watch.#$e#Maybe you could watch with me sometime, it'll be nice.
Neutral_6: Willy keeps inviting me to fish with him but I always feel bad hurting the fish.$2#$e#Maybe I could talk him into doing something else.
Neutral_7: I wouldn't watch the news today, it's pretty depressing.$6
Neutral_8: I feel like my head is full of static.$6#$e#I'll tell my therapist about it soon.
Neutral_9: Have you ever listened to chillwave? It's really relaxing.#$e#I love music honestly, I could listen to just about anything.$1
Bad_7: I'm really not feeling well today.$6#$e#Look, I just - I can't handle talking right now.$2#$e#Please, @, just leave me alone for now.$7
Bad_8: I feel really out of it right now.$2#$b#Even with my medications, I still have flare-ups of seeing things.$6#$e#I know I'm not abnormal, but I really wish I could just - have a brain that wasn't so sick, you know.$6
Bad_9: I don't even want to leave the house today.$7#$e#I just feel so angry, I don't even know why. I'm even annoying myself.$5
spring_23: Is it okay if I don't dance at the festival tomorrow? I'm really nervous.$6#$e#I'd rather just help set it up and watch everyone else have fun. Makes me happy to see people having fun.
spring_12: Find lots of eggs tomorrow, okay? I'll make something yummy with them.$1#$e#Oh, and try to beat Abby! She always seems to win, haha.$3
summer_10: I'm gonna put peppers in the pot-luck tomorrow.#$e#They're not spicy, don't worry, it's more like bell peppers.$1
summer_27: Did you know jellyfish don't have any brains?#$e#Isn't that odd? Imagine being alive but not having a brain.$6#$e#Oh, I was just thinking about that because of the festival tomorrow.$1
fall_15: I can't wait to eat all that fair food tomorrow.#$e#I love sponge cake the most.
fall_26: I couldn't figure out what I wanted to be for Spirit's Eve, so I'm just gonna go as a clown again.$1#$e#I love clowns a lot, so it's always a great choice to me.$3
winter_7: I'm glad Lewis frees the fish after everyone catches them.#$b#The Festival of Ice always makes me feel guilty. Those poor fishies.
winter_24: I love this time of year and the Winter Star festival is tomorrow!#$e#Hope you got a gift for your secret santa.
